original_title: Blood, Guts & Cleaning Supplies: The Making of 'The Janitor'
overview: Documentary about the making of the low-budget splatter horror comedy "The Janitor." Among the subjects covered in this documentary are casting and auditions, the shooting of the movie, the make-up effects, post-production work like additional dialogue recording, sound effects, and composing the score, and the theatrical premiere of the final finished film.
title: Blood, Guts & Cleaning Supplies: The Making of 'The Janitor'
